title: Assessment of cooking methods and freezing on the nutritional value and health risks of heavy metals in four fish species consumed in Douala, Cameroon
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Manz Koule Jules Christophe, Youogo Tegueu Marlène, Nsoga Valery Jean François, Nchoutpouen Ngafon Merlin, Gouado Inocent, Ndomou Mathieu
